attributes.action: Resign with immediate effect and call a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned hereby call on Gordon Brown to resign and call a general election due vote of no confidence in policies by the general public and to the broken promises made by the Labour government over the past 11 years, including a referendum on Europe, our healthcare, our policing and security.  Also for bringing in the Human Rights Act which has decimated the honest law abiding citizen in favour of the criminal fraternity.
